title: 新人驾到，生存大神一枚
author: skyinr

replies.txt_content: 标题: 新人驾到，生存大神一枚呐，这里是一枚BBS新人兼PC生存“大神”的帖子，这位新人纯净无污染，不含任何化学成分，请大家多多关照

replies.author: 白桦树树干
replies.txt_content: 新人你好，生存大神什么鬼…先膜拜一下

replies.author: Heathens
replies.txt_content: 新人泥豪

skyinr 发表于 2016-10-23 13:43
围观萌新
围观=======

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
新人你好啊 欢迎加入MCBBS大家庭 





"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."
